Key Match Events: Ja Morant showcased his intense athleticism with a 360-degree mid-air spin to score during the second quarter.
Despite Morant's impressive performance, the Grizzlies lost 106-104 to the Nets.
Ja Morant ended the game with 25 points, nine rebounds, and five assists.
Rookie center Zach Edey scored 25 points and grabbed 12 rebounds.
Dennis Schroder and Cam Johnson led the Nets with 20 points each.
Post-Match Reflections: The Memphis Grizzlies' close loss pushes them to 4-4 and 10th in the standings.
Ja Morant has remained healthy and is back to putting up consistent numbers this season.
